name: obsidian-wikipedia-data
description: Query Wikipedia APIs and insert data with custom templates and variables.

scripts.installPluginHotReload: npm run build && mkdir $obsidianVault/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-wikipedia-data ; cp {main.js,manifest.json} $obsidianVault/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-wikipedia-data/ && touch $obsidianVault/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-wikipedia-data/.hotreload
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Evan Harmon
